title: THANK YOU FOR QUALITY KOG'MAW SKIN!!!!!!

embed.description: RECENT NEWS: Meddler gameplay thoughts 3/7] [This is a W ORK I N P ROGRESS POST.] [ Status: The PBE currently still down for maintenance.] The PBE has been updated! As we kick off the 7.6 PBE cycle, tonight's update includes the Galio champion update with updated gameplay & looks, four new skins, and more!

body: This has to be the cutest Kog'Maw skin yet and I really love how much work that was put into it. The BEST part is that it doesn't really look like Kog'Maw's other skins since most of them seem to be either a recolor, texture change, or simply an added layer (besides battlecast and lion dance). I'm happy to add this to my complete collection of Kog'Maw skins :)!

replies.body:
I like it.

What I don't understand is why people don't like his skins because they look "ugly". Kog is a void monster; he was never made to be cute or adorable visually. You can put as much makeup as you want on a boar, it still looks like a boar.

Finally someone that is reasonable!

I think this is his best skin by far. The eyes and walking animations are adorable.

It has no visual clarity, you don't realize it's kog till he spits on you really, and then it comes off as a supremely low quality skin, which riot has pulled before, and this skin has nothing on monarch or lion dance, or even fucking reindeer.

> [{quoted}](name=Relish,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=EMhrYbfM,comment-id=00030001,timestamp=2017-03-08T06:29:41.839+0000)
>
> It has no visual clarity, you don't realize it's kog till he spits on you really, and then it comes off as a supremely low quality skin, which riot has pulled before, and this skin has nothing on monarch or lion dance, or even fucking reindeer.

Hey now, Reindeer Kog is the best Kog skin in the game.  Don't you go putting it down.

I hate it.

Mostly because I absolutely despise pugs with a fierce, burning passion.  I've been desperately hoping Riot wouldn't take the 'dog'maw' skin idea seriously, because now I'm still waiting for a new Kog skin that isn't awful.

Bad dog.

Worst skin.

oh nooo

I thought it was better simply because it wasn't just an overlay/recolor. also its kind of cute.

I also hate pugs but I guess they used pugs to make  the pun

> [{quoted}](name=General KogMaw,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=EMhrYbfM,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2017-03-08T02:06:47.222+0000)
>
> oh nooo
> 
> I thought it was better simply because it wasn't just an overlay/recolor. also its kind of cute.
> 
> I also hate pugs but I guess they used pugs to make  the pun

I've been holding out hope for 'Trained Dragon Kog' ever since we got Dragon Trainer Trist.

This thing is just... ugh.  The art-style doesn't match League at all.  It looks like one of those shitty fan-made skins.

If it were Kog in an obvious dog costume with hilarious google eyes flopping around on top of the head I think I would be okay with it.  This thing is just... I dunno.  It doesn't fit.

Trained Dragon Kog'Maw would be really cool too!

I guess I really like the change of art style because looking at Sonoran, Caterpillar, and Deep Sea Kog'Maw is really really boring. It does look fan made but idk just heart warming to me.

I understand it doesn't fit but the suggestion you made would be an overlay and probably named "Definitely not Kog'Maw"

> [{quoted}](name=General KogMaw,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=EMhrYbfM,comment-id=0005000000000000,timestamp=2017-03-08T02:24:31.646+0000)
>
> Trained Dragon Kog'Maw would be really cool too!
> 
> I guess I really like the change of art style because looking at Sonoran, Caterpillar, and Deep Sea Kog'Maw is really really boring. It does look fan made but idk just heart warming to me.
> 
> I understand it doesn't fit but the suggestion you made would be an overlay and probably named "Definitely not Kog'Maw"

Totally normal Earth-canine (you suspect nothing)
Eats Literally Anything (no trips to the vet)

> [{quoted}](name=General KogMaw,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=EMhrYbfM,comment-id=000500000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-03-08T02:38:08.877+0000)
>
> Eats Literally Anything (no trips to the vet)

So American Kog'Maw?

Idk... Looks too uncanny for me, it's too realistic to be into the game, yet too cartoony to look like an actual pug.

All in all.. It looks like a fan made skin, and i've seen better

compared to all his other skins, this is a well deserved one. look at in-game sonaran and caterpillar. the realistic part is the eyes because they stare into your soul when you're trying to kill me...... so don't hurt puppy kog!
Dafuq O_o i thought was fake for a second there
